data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Nickerie, Suriname a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nickerie, Suriname
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Nickerie, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Nickerie, Suriname.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Nickerie.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, Dutch people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Nickerie to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Nickerie, Suriname. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 36,700 citizens of Nickerie, Suriname, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

location.name: Nickerie
location.people_groups_list: Tiriyo, Indonesian, Sikiana, Arab, Syrian, Saramaccan, Matawari
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tiriyo (2,200), Indonesian (19,000), Sikiana (30), Arab, Syrian (1,200), Saramaccan, Matawari (1,300)
